info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cabarrus and southwestern Rowan Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kannapolis, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, West Concord, China Grove, Landis, Enochville, Rockwell, Mt Pleasant, Faith and Granite Quarry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
